alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Lane; Ness; Rush; Scott; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 11:44PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ness, northeastern Scott, Trego, Lane, northwestern Rush and Ellis Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1144 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Palco to near Arnold to 14 miles southwest of Gove. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Arnold around 1150 PM CDT. Ransom around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Healy, Ness City, Yocemento, Shields, Catherine, Pendennis, Hays, Dighton, Bazine, Victoria, Alamota, Toulon and Munjor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central and west central Kansas.

area.areaDesc: Ellis; Lane; Ness; Rush; Scott; Trego
